Class StockAccount

com.company.Account.Account

public class StockAccount
extends Account
Stocks Account. Inherits Account.

  • Method Details

    • buyShare

      public void buyShare​(java.lang.String corpName, int amount, CurrencyType currencyType) throws StockNotExistException, InadequateBalanceException, java.io.IOException
      Buys a share.
      Parameters:
      corpName - Name of the stock
      amount - Amount of shares bought
      currencyType - Currency paid with
      Throws:
      StockNotExistException - If the stock does not exist
      InadequateBalanceException - If inadequate balance in this account
      java.io.IOException - Data file not exist

    • sellShare

      public void sellShare​(java.lang.String corpName, int amount) throws StockNotExistException, NotEnoughShareException
      Sells a stock.
      Parameters:
      corpName - Stock name
      amount - Amount of shares sold
      Throws:
      StockNotExistException - Does not have any shares of that stock
      NotEnoughShareException - Attempting to sell more shares than possessed

    • addShare

      public void addShare​(java.lang.String corpName, int amount)
      Adds a share directly to shares holding. SHOULD ONLY BE CALLED IN AccountFactory.
      Parameters:
      corpName - Name of the stock
      amount - Amount of shares

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Account

    • getSharesHolding

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getSharesHolding()
      Get the info of all shares holding.
      Returns:
      Map of String to Integer, from stock name to amount holding.
